name: Protection zone
description: It's a tile where you can't be attacked by mobs and players, You can usually find these in entrance of zones

name: Party
description: You will usually read these when people are finding / wanting to join a party

name: Congratz
description: It's when you or others level up the level or the stats

name: Area of effect
description: It means the abilities that cause certain effects in large areas, such as explotions

name: Water slimes
description: It's the name of a mob located in level 45 zone

name: Player killer
description: It's when a player kiling players for no reason

name: Player kill
description: It's when you or others accidentaly or intentionally kill someone

name: Kill on sight
description: It's when a specific player or guild is hunting you

name: Kill steal
description: It's when you or others accidentaly or intentionally hit your or his mob

name: Hell1
description: It's a level 25 zone located in imps

name: Hell2
description: It's a level 35 zone located in imps

name: Skull
description: It's a skull can be found on the top of the players head indicating that player hit / kill another player.

name: Yellow Skull
description: It's a type of a skull that can be found on the top of the players head. Use `infos` command to learn more.

name: Red Skull
description: It's a type of a skull that can be found on the top of the players head. Use `infos` command to learn more.
